caption.title: Altitudes of El Oro parakeets.
caption.p: The birds were observed in the years 2002 (998 ± 36 m), 2011 (1061 ± 63 m), and 2012 (1081 ± 23 m). For the years 1985 and 1986, literature values of the distribution range are given (600–1100 m). The El Oro parakeets shifted their range uphill at a rate of 8.5 m per year (depicted by the blue line).
